text:
A man who filmed himself as he tortured and raped four women has been jailed today for 24 years.

Andy Anokye, a Grime musician who performed as Solo 45, was convicted in March following a four month trial of a total of 30 offences, including 21 counts of rape. https://t.co/TPKsM246t9

text:
A man from Highbridge has received an indefinite hospital order after pleading guilty to manslaughter by diminished responsibility.

Richard Matthews, 45, was mentally unwell when he killed his 39-year-old neighbour Paul Wells in June last year.

More: https://t.co/rWFK6LouvD https://t.co/kTwPxAKMYA
